about_the_game:
Virtual Drug Dealer is an immersive open-world VR crime simulator that puts you in the shoes of an up-and-coming drug dealer trying to build an empire. Navigate the streets of a sprawling city, make deals, fight for survival, and climb the criminal underworld while managing risk and reward.

The game features a fully physics-driven combat system 

Expand your operation by building up your corner—hire and manage drug dealers to push your product, defend your territory, and increase your profits.

The city offers more than just business opportunities. Explore a variety of locations, from rundown apartment complexes and seedy motels to neon-lit nightclubs and strip clubs where deals can be made and alliances formed. Every decision affects your rise to power—will you become a feared kingpin, or will the streets consume you?

With an open-ended progression system, intense street fights, and a city full of opportunities and dangers, Virtual Drug Dealer delivers an immersive VR crime experience where your choices shape your drug empire.

content_descriptors.notes: Sexual and graphic content, including a strip club, naked bodies and blood and violence

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Vive wands and WMR not officially supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 8-16 Core 4GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070
  • VR Support: OpenXR, standing or room scale
  • Additional Notes: Vive wands and WMR not officially supported

short_description: Fight, deal, and dominate the streets in Virtual Drug Dealer, an open-world VR crime simulator. Take on rivals in brutal physics-driven combat and build your empire in a sprawling city. Upgrade your character, explore back alleys and strip clubs, and control the underworld
